title: New: Amber Run – Spark
content:
The latest track, Spark, from Amber Run (previously known as Amber before they encountered a German Trance writer of the same name) is every bit as fresh as the faces of these British chaps. Although very much an indie background, they definitely stamp their own sound onto the track.

If you’re new to Amber Run they’re kind of like a slightly angsty Bastille shaking hands with Noah and the Whale. If that’s you’re thing then be sure to listen to their EP Noah which was released in July of last year (if you don’t like the sound of that, check out their well-designed “wave” EP cover art).

[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/138858312″ params=”color=0066cc&auto_play=false&hide_related=false&show_artwork=true” width=”100%” height=”166″ iframe=”true” /]
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d09
